00055     class _OgrePagingExport PageContentCollection : public PageAlloc
00056     {

00058         PageContentCollectionFactory* mCreator;

00060     public:
00061         static const uint32 CHUNK_ID;
00062         static const uint16 CHUNK_VERSION;
00063
